TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BamlLocalizabilityResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in binary XAML (BAML).

span.span: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in binary XAML (BAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可供为了解析中类和属性的本地化设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]。 is used by the in order to resolve localizability settings for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]. 冲突解决程序在提取资源以及本地化时的时间称为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]更新。The resolver is called both at the time of resource extraction as well as when localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated. 在提取资源时 ()，该冲突解决程序：At the time of resource extraction (), the resolver: - 提供了中有关类和属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]时构造可本地化的资源。Provides for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] when the is constructing localizable resources. - 提供格式设置首选项中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]因此元素的格式为内联标记。Provides formatting preferences for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] so elements are formatted as inline tags. 在本地化的时间[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]更新 ()，该冲突解决程序：At the time at which localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated (), the resolver: - 格式设置标记的解析回类。Resolves formatting tags back into classes. - 解析包含类定义的程序集的名称。Resolves the name of the assembly that contains class definition. - 通过执行的类函数的实际方案的内部类子类化。 is subclassed by an internal class that performs the practical aspects of the class functions for .

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified type of element can be localized and, if so, whether it can be formatted inline.

returns.span: An object that contains the localizability information for the specified assembly and element.

summary.span: Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].

span.span: Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].

returns.span: The full class name associated with the tag.

span.span: The full class name associated with the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将调用此方法或等效值将替代应用于可本地化的资源。This method is called when a or an equivalent is applying substitutions to localizable resources. 如果在替换中遇到的格式设置标记，被调用此方法，若要解决回类名称的格式设置标记。If a formatting tag is encountered in the substitutions, this method is called to resolve the formatting tag back to a class name.
